comment: Inverse binomial transform of A077860. Partial sums of A084100.

link: Colin Barker, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000

formula: a(n) = 2 * A101455(n) for n>0. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jun 01 2010

a(n) = i*((-i)^n-i^n) for n>0, where i = sqrt(-1).
